content.raw: @{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8} After removing the deprecation warning and reverting the sdf files, I realize there’s nothing else to add to Citadel since the grid is already ported. Since grid is on by default, the test file is no longer needed either. I guess this PR can then be closed. Did I forget anything?
content.html: @Louise Poubel After removing the deprecation warning and reverting the sdf files, I realize there’s nothing else to add to Citadel since the grid is already ported. Since grid is on by default, the test file is no longer needed either. I guess this PR can then be closed. Did I forget anything?
